    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oathbow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=392)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 602 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Constructed of a flexible, white wood and with ornate, twisting designs carved into its surface, this _+2 striking composite [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)_ appears to have been made by [elves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=2). Sometimes when you loose an arrow, its whistling in flight sounds like a voice whispering in [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), wishing for the swift defeat of your enemies.

<document level="2" id="action-218" />

After you activate the bow, you can’t activate it again for 7 days. If you kill the creature you’ve sworn an oath against, the oath ends and you need to wait only 10 minutes before you can activate it again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Oathbow
